Description:
We are looking for an experienced Chief Financial Officer for our company in KSA. The CFO will work remotely from the company offices in Jordan and conduct visits to the company offices in KSA whenever is required.The CFO will guide the financial systems that empower the group. Our client is searching for an experienced CFO to join its team of high-performing professionals to help keep the group finances insightful and instrumental to its continued success. The CFO will have both a day-to-day and ongoing impact on group operations, helping to analyze, strategize, and grow its financial position. This seasoned strategist not only understands current accounting practices and trends, but has proven experience raising capital and adapting to change–both in growth and downsizing. As a member of its senior management, CFO will be comfortable in a leadership role that demands clear communication and presentation skills.ResponsibilitiesResponsible, either directly or by managing staff, for all cash management, investments, insurance, budgeting, and financial reporting, helping to drive the company’s financial strategy and hiring needs
Coordinate the development of the annual operating, capital, and program budgets, and reporting against the same
Ensure cash flow is compatible with company operations, by overseeing the day-to-day accounting, recording, reporting, and internal control activities of the organization
Lead the development and use of best-practice policies, practices, and tools that ensure a well-controlled yet flexible organization with strong fiscal management, project management, cross team communications and workflow
Ensure compliance with the law and company’s policies
Comply with laws and local financial requirements by studying existing and new legislation, enforcing compliance, and taking action
Perform risk management by analyzing the organization’s liabilities and investments
Decide on investment strategies by considering cash and liquidity risks
Manage vendor relationships
Work with the senior management to efficiently develop proposal budgets, provide access to project finance information, and manage contract/grant compliance and reporting
Research revenue opportunities and economic trends, analyze internal operations, identify areas of cost reduction and process enhancement
Monitor performance with tracking, establish corrective measures as needed, and prepare detailed reports, both current and forecasting for earnings calls, the management team, and the rest of the companySkills
Skills:
BSc/BA in Accounting, Finance or relevant field; MSc/MBA is a plus
10+ years of experience working with diverse jurisdictions / markets in big companies having a multicultural environment
In depth knowledge of corporate financial law and risk management practices
Experienced in complex structures and diverse industries
Strong leadership and organizational skills
Excellent communication and people skills
Excellent knowledge of data analysis and forecasting methods
Exceptional verbal, written, and visual communication skills
Understanding of advanced accounting, regulatory issues, and tax planning
CPA is a strong advantage
